page.title: 08Leisure and Pastimes.
page.content: Leisure in Redditch mostly consists of sporting activities. There are{sports {centres}provided at{Abbey Stadium}and Arrow Valley Super Squash. Based at the Abbey track is an athletics club. The Stadium also has 8 tennis courts, a bowling green, football and rugby pitches, and{indoor facilities}to cater for indoor sports. There is also a road cycle club and a B.M.X. track. Each year a{marathon}is run through the streets of the town. For months before, people can be seen jogging and training for the race. The town has its own{Palace Theatre}where plays by mainly{local societies}can be seen. At meeting rooms there are activities from Tumble Tots for young children to the popular aerobics, as well as disco dances. Cubs, scouts and guides meet throughout the town.{Night school} classes are organised at the college.
